Translations.Text: Ne$ day d Iddem tullas seg wayen Ixleq, u Ifren awen d arrac
Ma ibbwev ed usali yiwen segsen, $ef wayen id ifka d amedya i Uenin, ad yibrik wudem is, ad ikkufer
ayen d ikren di rreue, ur nessifrir anamer
Eesben lmalayek, i illan d ixdimen n Uenin, d nnta. Day eevoen i uxlaq nnsent? Tira $ef ccada nnsen; fellasen asteqsi
Nnan: "lemmer Irad Uenin, yili ur ten naabbid". Ur sain kra n tmusni $ef waya. Nitni la pxeooiven kan
Ne$ Nefka yasen Tazmamt, uqbel Tagi, d$a, degs, iifen
Xaii! Nnan: "nufa d, ih, imezwura nne$, di laaqida. D$a, nekwni, Nedda di lateo nnsen
Am akka, ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, aneddao ar temdint, mebla ma nnan isaiyen is: "nufa d imezwura nne$ di laaqida. D$a, nedda d lateo nnsen
Inna: "i ma bbwi$ awen d nnhaya yifen tin id tufam ar imezwura nnwen"? Nnan: "nekwni, ihi, nugwi ayen is id teppuceggaam
Nerra d ppao, segsen. Muqel amek tevoa d inekkaoen
